name: technical_interview-near-shore-version-2
description: To successfully complete the coding test the candidate will need access to an environment with the following installed: 1. [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en) 2. [TypeScript.js](https://www.typescriptlang.org/download) 3. [Jest](https://www.typescriptlang.org/download) 4. [ts-jest](https://jestjs.io/docs/getting-started#via-ts-jest) 5. [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com) or other preferred text editor compatible with TypeScript
